name: Champion Great Sword
description: A fortified great sword designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Defender Great Sword I
description: A great sword crafted especially to fight off calamity. Modified so that anybody can use it.

name: Champion Great Sword III
description: A fortified great sword designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Kamura Cleaver I
description: A high-quality great sword forged using world-famous steel from Kamura Village.

name: Kamura Cleaver II
description: A high-quality great sword forged using world-famous steel from Kamura Village.

name: Kamura Cleaver III
description: A high-quality great sword forged using world-famous steel from Kamura Village.

name: Guardian Great Sword
description: Used by village defenders, this great sword fortifies one's power to protect like castle walls.

name: Champion Great Sword II
description: A fortified great sword designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Kamura Cleaver V
description: A high-quality great sword forged using world-famous steel from Kamura Village.

name: Kamura Warrior Cleaver
description: Forged with Kamura Steel. When swung, this vast sword barely makes a sound at all.

name: Kamura Cleaver IV
description: A high-quality great sword forged using world-famous steel from Kamura Village.

name: Decapitator Schneiden
description: An ancient executioner's tool, resurrected. Prey kneel in fear, offering their necks.

name: Kamura Warrior Cleaver+
description: Forged with Kamura Steel. When swung, this vast sword barely makes a sound at all.

name: Duke's Claymore
description: A great sword used to execute criminals, its red blade still craving felonious ichor.

name: Fine Kamura Cleaver
description: A great sword for a great hero and village protector. Threateners of peace beware!

name: Kamura Ninja Cleaver
description: Forged with Kamura Steel. When swung, this vast sword barely makes a sound at all.

name: Gossblade II
description: Made from Goss Harag parts, this sharp-pointed great sword has a chilling aura.

name: Gossblade I
description: Made from Goss Harag parts, this sharp-pointed great sword has a chilling aura.

name: Hanayako Yohino I
description: A great sword of a refined, educated samurai. These petals blossom with death.

name: Abominable Frostblade
description: The Gossblade perfected. Each strike is like ten tons of snow ploughing into foes.

name: Abominable Snowblade+
description: This Gossblade has been polished until it gives off a cold and chilling light.

name: Abominable Snowblade
description: This Gossblade has been polished until it gives off a cold and chilling light.

name: Hanayako Yohino II
description: A great sword of a refined, educated samurai. These petals blossom with death.

name: Akanesasu
description: A Hanayako Yohino upgrade. Shines pale in the dawn like the lives it snatches.

name: Abominable Great Sword
description: This Gossblade has been polished until it gives off a cold and chilling light.

name: Akanesasu+
description: A Hanayako Yohino upgrade. Shines pale in the dawn like the lives it snatches.

name: Akanesasu Divider+
description: A pale blade that severs the ties between loved ones with ill-fated fortunes.

name: Akanesasu Divider
description: A pale blade that severs the ties between loved ones with ill-fated fortunes.

name: Axeblade I
description: An extremely heavy, axe-like sword. Perfect for those who wish to test their might.

name: Axeblade II
description: An extremely heavy, axe-like sword. Perfect for those who wish to test their might.

name: Colossal Axeblade
description: A great sword for those who care only for maximum power. Ease of use is secondary.

name: Carapace Sword I
description: A blade shaped like a Barroth's head; it packs nearly as much punch.

name: Carapace Sword II
description: A blade shaped like a Barroth's head; it packs nearly as much punch.

name: Carapace Blade
description: A Carapace Sword upgrade. To see it gouge the earth is to know fear itself.

name: Carapace Buster+
description: A Carapace Blade upgrade. To see it gouge the earth is to know true fear.

name: Tiger Jawblade I
description: Modeled on a large Tigrex fang. One swipe can rip the target to shreds.

name: Carapace Buster
description: A Carapace Blade upgrade. To see it gouge the earth is to know true fear.

name: Tigrex Great Sword
description: An upgraded Tiger Jawblade. Anyone with this has truly conquered the world.

name: Tigrex Great Sword+
description: An upgraded Tiger Jawblade. Anyone with this has truly conquered the world.

name: Barroth Smasher
description: Like a terrifying landslide, this grim weapon crushes all, including their fighting spirit.

name: Tigrex Supreme Sword
description: Like a wave of destruction wreaked by the Tigrex, this blade ravages all.

name: Tigrex Supreme Sword+
description: Like a wave of destruction wreaked by the Tigrex, this blade ravages all.

name: Khezu Shock Sword I
description: A sword clad in elemental material, which electrifies the blade.

name: Khezu Shock Sword II
description: A sword clad in elemental material, which electrifies the blade.

name: Khezu Shock Blade
description: An upgraded Khezu Shock Sword. Each swing bathes the land in deadly electricity.

name: Khezu Shock Blade+
description: An upgraded Khezu Shock Blade. Each swing bathes the land in deadly electricity.

name: Khezu Shock Full+
description: A Khezu great sword, its insane voltage leaves behind a husk without even time to scream.

name: Khezu Shock Full
description: A Khezu great sword, its insane voltage leaves behind a husk without even time to scream.

name: Izuchi Blade I
description: A great sword made of Izuchi parts. Izuchi are nimble, so the handling is great.

name: Snapper Blade
description: This strengthened Izuchi Blade tears up hunting grounds like a fierce wind.

name: Izuchi Blade II
description: A great sword made of Izuchi parts. Izuchi are nimble, so the handling is great.

name: Blower's Blade
description: Flesh or bone, it matters not. The gale gives way to a storm of slashes.

name: Snapper Blade+
description: This strengthened Izuchi Blade tears up hunting grounds like a fierce wind.

name: Deadly Serpentblade I
description: A traditional blade made from Remobra parts. Venom coats its scarlet fangs.

name: Deadly Serpentblade II
description: A traditional blade made from Remobra parts. Venom coats its scarlet fangs.

name: Poison Serpentblade
description: The Deadly Serpentblade's upgraded form. The red fangs make for an ill omen.

name: Poison Serpentblade+
description: The Deadly Serpentblade's upgraded form. The red fangs make for an ill omen.

name: Snakesmaw
description: The sublime crimson blade tempts into darkness as Serpentblade toxin takes immediate effect.

name: Hidden Blade I
description: A vastly remodeled Ravager Blade made with Nargacuga parts for improved strength.

name: Hidden Blade II
description: A vastly remodeled Ravager Blade made with Nargacuga parts for improved strength.

name: Dark of Night
description: The Hidden Blade's upgraded form. Nobody comes away alive after seeing it.

name: Gloom of Night
description: A great sword as dark as night, the souls it has consumed are consigned to the abyss.

name: Gloom of Night+
description: A great sword as dark as night, the souls it has consumed are consigned to the abyss.

name: Avidya Great Sword
description: A weapon forged by assassins in ancients times. Every harvested soul hones its baleful blade.

name: Frilled Blade I
description: A great sword shrouded in a bewitching aura. It is exquisitely sharp.

name: Illusory Frilled Blade
description: A great sword so sharp, it cuts through enemies as if they were sea foam.

name: Frilled Blade II
description: A great sword shrouded in a bewitching aura. It is exquisitely sharp.

name: Nightmare Frilled Blade
description: Lulls prey to sleep with an alluring call, then swiftly ends even their nightmares.

name: Illusory Frilled Blade+
description: A great sword so sharp, it cuts through enemies as if they were sea foam.

name: Nightmare Frilled Blade+
description: Lulls prey to sleep with an alluring call, then swiftly ends even their nightmares.

name: Bloom Snow Blade+
description: A frosty blade made from the belly of an Aurora Somnacanth. Cleave foes with hefty ice.

name: Bloom Snow Blade
description: A frosty blade made from the belly of an Aurora Somnacanth. Cleave foes with hefty ice.

name: Flicker Blizzard Blade
description: When the carvings on this blade flash into light, the very air turns to ice.

name: Steel Sword
description: Forged with the finest ores, this sword looks traditional but its edge is a cut above.

name: Iron Sword I
description: A great sword that's seen extended use for ages. Good for beginners, too.

name: Buster Sword I
description: A steel great sword that's perfect for beginners and admired for its handling.

name: Chrome Razor I
description: A strong, razor-sharp edge (hence the name). This blade hides a secret poison.

name: Buster Blade
description: A Buster Sword upgrade. Forged with the purest steel for greater attack power.

name: Chrome Quietus
description: The Chrome Razor's upgraded form. Stocked with poison extracted from dragons.

name: Chrome Hell
description: An exiled artisan forged a toxic blade through forbidden arts to inflict hellish pain upon prey.

name: Chrome Heaven
description: An upgrade to Chrome Hell's toxicity, its deadly poison likened to a stairway to heaven.

name: Astalos Crashblade
description: A great sword modeled off Astalos wings. Thunder sounds with every slash.

name: Chrome Hell+
description: An exiled artisan forged a toxic blade through forbidden arts to inflict hellish pain upon prey.

name: Astalos Crashblade+
description: A great sword modeled off Astalos wings. Thunder sounds with every slash.

name: Barbaroi Blade I
description: A great blade housing a raging inferno. The lightest swing ignites an epic blaze.

name: Astalos Arcblade
description: Cries of rebellion threaten all life, ending military rule and leaving naught but dust.

name: Barbaroi Blade II
description: A great blade housing a raging inferno. The lightest swing ignites an epic blaze.

name: Crimson Goat
description: An upgraded Barbaroi Blade. Those seared by its crimson edge are turned to ash.

name: Inferno Goat
description: An upgraded Barbaroi Blade. Those seared by its crimson edge are turned to ash.

name: Blood Baph
description: Faced by this crimson brute, base fear grips all, and hellfire befalls attackers.

name: Inferno Goat+
description: An upgraded Barbaroi Blade. Those seared by its crimson edge are turned to ash.

name: Pukei Edge I
description: A brutishly large sword decorated with green Pukei-Pukei feathers.

name: Pukei Edge II
description: A brutishly large sword decorated with green Pukei-Pukei feathers.

name: Datura Cleaver+
description: When upgrading the Datura Cleaver, the artisan managed to maximize its toxicity.

name: Datura Cleaver
description: When upgrading the Pukei Edge, the artisan was able to maximize its toxicity.

name: Datura Slasher
description: A master craftsman succeeded in imbuing this blade with deadly Pukei-Pukei toxin.

name: Datura Slasher+
description: A master craftsman succeeded in imbuing this blade with deadly Pukei-Pukei toxin.

name: Icicle Fang I
description: A blade that freezes foes; a manifestation of Barioth, Ruler of the Tundra.

name: Icicle Fang II
description: A blade that freezes foes; a manifestation of Barioth, Ruler of the Tundra.

name: Paladire
description: An Icicle Fang upgrade. One strike can freeze a deep ocean—and shatter it.

name: Glaciator
description: A Paladire upgrade. One strike can freeze an ocean, and then shatter it.

name: Glaciator+
description: A Paladire upgrade. One strike can freeze an ocean, and then shatter it.

name: Blizzard Biter
description: One strike cleaves heaven from earth, and all life is frozen for eternity.

name: Sword of Winter Moon
description: Lunagaron's ferocity embodied in a great sword. The chill felt on approach might just be fear...

name: Vadel Frostedge
description: The absolute zero chill emitted by the blade cuts through prey and freezes the very ground.

name: Sword of Winter Moon+
description: Lunagaron's ferocity embodied in a great sword. The chill felt on approach might just be fear...

name: Aknosom Blade I
description: A great sword consisting of gently honed Aknosom parts that give it a fine shimmer.

name: Aknosom Blade II
description: A great sword consisting of gently honed Aknosom parts that give it a fine shimmer.

name: Daybreak Cleaver
description: An Aknosom Blade polished to perfection. Often gifted to warriors who show loyalty.

name: Dawnmoon Cleaver+
description: A great sword that reflects sunlight like the moon. No foe can withstand its fire.

name: Dawnmoon Hopebeam
description: This great sword gleams like the sun, offering fame and glory to devoted heroes.

name: Dawnmoon Cleaver
description: A great sword that reflects sunlight like the moon. No foe can withstand its fire.

name: Tetranadon Edge I
description: A great sword made from a sharpened Tetranadon beak. The edge is slightly moist.

name: Tetranadon Cutter
description: An upgraded Tetranadon Edge. Blows from this great sword make the ground tremble.

name: Tetranadon Cutter+
description: An upgraded Tetranadon Edge. Blows from this great sword make the ground tremble.

name: Tetranadon Edge II
description: A great sword made from a sharpened Tetranadon beak. The edge is slightly moist.

name: True Tetranadon Cutter
description: A refined Tetranadon great sword, its blow like a tempered fist, cracking the earth.

name: True Tetranadon Cutter+
description: A refined Tetranadon great sword, its blow like a tempered fist, cracking the earth.

name: Bone Cleaver I
description: A great sword made of monster bones. Designed to emphasize destructive power.

name: Bone Slasher
description: A great sword made of choice monster bones. Not all that sharp, but very destructive.

name: Jawblade I
description: A traditional bone great sword, named as such because it resembles a toothy maw.

name: Giant Jawblade
description: The Jawblade's upgraded form is still powerful, but now it's much sharper too.

name: Wyvern Fang I
description: Once belonging to a great predator, these teeth make fine natural weapons.

name: Great Wyvern Fang
description: A great sword fashioned by an old craftsman seeking to elevate the art of bonework.

name: Great Wyvern Fang+
description: A great sword fashioned by an old craftsman seeking to elevate the art of bonework.

name: Wyvern Gnasher
description: A replica of the jaw of a mighty wyvern, once said to rule over all others.

name: Wyvern Gnasher+
description: A replica of the jaw of a mighty wyvern, once said to rule over all others.

name: Red Pincer
description: A Great Sword made from a giant pincer. Its blade rips off scales and slices flesh.

name: Red Pincer+
description: A Great Sword made from a giant pincer. Its blade rips off scales and slices flesh.

name: Great Pincer
description: The Red Pincer's upgraded form. Its scarlet hue amplifies its potential for atrocity.

name: Golem Blade I
description: A great sword formed from a giant bone. Its powerful, hefty blade is deadly.

name: Ceanataur Blade+
description: Sharp Great Sword made from a blue shell. Only the finest materials are used in its blade.

name: Ceanataur Blade
description: Sharp Great Sword made from a blue shell. Only the finest materials are used in its blade.

name: Killer's Scythe
description: This Ceanataur Blade's upgrade boasts sharpness that lives up to its name.

name: Blade of Talos
description: Legends say that this sword was wielded by giants. Very heavy and very destructive.

name: Blade of Talos+
description: Legends say that this sword was wielded by giants. Very heavy and very destructive.

name: Blade of Tartarus
description: A super heavy blade that brings pure power to those with the arms to swing it.

name: Blade of Tartarus+
description: A super heavy blade that brings pure power to those with the arms to swing it.

name: Impudent Cheda
description: The Cheda Blade's upgraded form gleams with its inexhaustible sharpness.

name: Cheda Blade+
description: A great sword resembling a Seregios horn. Its dazzling blow cuts through any darkness.

name: Valkyrie Blade I
description: A well-crafted bone blade. Bears the majestic pride of the Queen of the Land.

name: Valkyrie Blade II
description: A well-crafted bone blade. Bears the majestic pride of the Queen of the Land.

name: Cheda Blade
description: A great sword resembling a Seregios horn. Its dazzling blow cuts through any darkness.

name: Sieglinde+
description: An upgraded Valkyrie Blade. Beautiful but deadly, thanks to its poison.

name: Sieglinde
description: An upgraded Valkyrie Blade. Beautiful but deadly, thanks to its poison.

name: High Sieglinde
description: Poison-soaked cloth adds majesty to this blade, befitting its namesake.

name: High Sieglinde+
description: Poison-soaked cloth adds majesty to this blade, befitting its namesake.

name: Rosenbrett+
description: Espinas great sword. Lined with sharp, raged-filled spikes that can never break.

name: Rosenbrett
description: Espinas great sword. Lined with sharp, raged-filled spikes that can never break.

name: Rosenkraft
description: A great sword enhanced with robust materials. Its sharp red thorns drink deep of its prey.

name: Jyura Mudblade I
description: A great sword made from Jyuratodus parts. It has a slight smell of fresh mud.

name: Jyura Mudblade II
description: A great sword made from Jyuratodus parts. It has a slight smell of fresh mud.

name: Terracutter
description: An upgraded Jyura Mudblade that glints like an ancient swamp on a moonlit night.

name: Terracutter+
description: An upgraded Jyura Mudblade that glints like an ancient swamp on a moonlit night.

name: Valtos Rapier
description: A Jyuratodus great sword made stronger by craftsmen. Rough, yet gleams with honed sharpness.

name: Valtos Rapier+
description: A Jyuratodus great sword made stronger by craftsmen. Rough, yet gleams with honed sharpness.

name: Red Wing I
description: A blade inspired by Rathalos wings. Incendiaries turn its slashes to arcs of flame.

name: Rathalos Firesword+
description: An upgraded Red Wing great sword. Each slash shoots flames that incinerate all.

name: Red Wing II
description: A blade inspired by Rathalos wings. Incendiaries turn its slashes to arcs of flame.

name: Rathalos Shriekedge
description: All life kneels before royal bluster, subjugating kingship and leaving naught but ash.

name: Rathalos Firesword
description: An upgraded Red Wing great sword. Each slash shoots flames that incinerate all.

name: Quarrel Hornsword I
description: A wild-looking, considerably powerful blade crafted from Diablos horns.

name: Quarrel Hornsword II
description: A wild-looking, considerably powerful blade crafted from Diablos horns.

name: Feud Hornsword
description: A Quarrel Hornsword upgrade. Those who can call forth its power are worthy of fear.

name: Vendetta Hornsword+
description: Wielders of this Hornsword upgrade strike terror with the awesome power it brings.

name: Hack Blade I
description: Making premium use of basic Jaggi parts, this great sword is fiercely ferocious.

name: Hack Blade II
description: Making premium use of basic Jaggi parts, this great sword is fiercely ferocious.

name: Feud Hornsword+
description: A Quarrel Hornsword upgrade. Those who can call forth its power are worthy of fear.

name: Jaggi Greatblade
description: A Jaggi great sword honed for destruction, but without losing its wild edge.

name: Vendetta Hornsword
description: Wielders of this Hornsword upgrade strike terror with the awesome power it brings.

name: Jaggi Greatblade+
description: A Jaggi great sword honed for destruction, but without losing its wild edge.

name: Avallo Blade
description: A Jaggi great sword of immense destruction. Chip away at prey with feral audacity.

name: Flammenzahn I
description: The wild hunting instinct of an Anjanath lives on in this savage great sword.

name: Flammenzahn II
description: The wild hunting instinct of an Anjanath lives on in this savage great sword.

name: Gnashing Flammenzahn+
description: A Flammenzahn upgrade. The edge has been ground to an even deadlier sharpness.

name: Lohenzahn
description: A sublime masterpiece forged in an Anjanath's inferno. Its flaming fang devours prey.

name: Lohenzahn+
description: A sublime masterpiece forged in an Anjanath's inferno. Its flaming fang devours prey.

name: Usurper's Storm I
description: A weapon of indelible character. Its might cannot be overstated.

name: Gnashing Flammenzahn
description: A Flammenzahn upgrade. The edge has been ground to an even deadlier sharpness.

name: Usurper's Storm II
description: A weapon of indelible character. Its might cannot be overstated.

name: Despot's Blackstorm
description: Become a lord of thunder with the upgraded form of the Usurper's Storm.

name: Despot's Blackstorm+
description: Become a lord of thunder with the upgraded form of the Usurper's Storm.

name: Oppressor's Forger
description: Pierce the heavens and crash over the land with a great sword of unparalleled strength.

name: Cataclysm Sword II
description: A blade of absorbent sponge. Its pressurized water can break through tough shells.

name: Cataclysm Blade+
description: A Cataclysm Sword upgrade. The water inside it leaves behind rainbows.

name: Aquatic Cataclysm
description: Spray from its slashes are illuminated by the sun, casting a rainbow over the oceans.

name: Cataclysm Blade
description: A Cataclysm Sword upgrade. The water inside it leaves behind rainbows.

name: Aquatic Cataclysm+
description: Spray from its slashes are illuminated by the sun, casting a rainbow over the oceans.

name: Golm Blade
description: A Garangolm great sword, its clumsy construction emphasizing weighty and sturdy defense.

name: Golm Blade+
description: A Garangolm great sword, its clumsy construction emphasizing weighty and sturdy defense.

name: Great Gorgigas
description: A great sword that cuts prey to ribbons with the sheer force of a Garangolm.

name: Snowclad II
description: Cold though this sword might be, the decorative bits keep the wielder toasty.

name: Lagombi Charlotte
description: This upgraded Snowclad radiates with the majesty of the snow-driven Lagombi.

name: Lagombi Decider
description: A great sword imbued with Lagombi's power. Weakens prey by freezing inflicted wounds.

name: Lagombi Charlotte+
description: This upgraded Snowclad radiates with the majesty of the snow-driven Lagombi.

name: Snowclad I
description: Cold though this sword might be, the decorative bits keep the wielder toasty.

name: Sinister Blade I
description: A sword from the Wyvern of Malice. It gleams slightly, as if home to its spirit.

name: Sinister Blade II
description: A sword from the Wyvern of Malice. It gleams slightly, as if home to its spirit.

name: Sinister Shadowblade
description: The vengeful spirit of the Wyvern of Malice can be felt when this sword is drawn.

name: Sinister Shadowblade+
description: The vengeful spirit of the Wyvern of Malice can be felt when this sword is drawn.

name: Azure Blaze Great Sword
description: A reaper of carnage, hungry for souls to fuel its azure flames.

name: Mighty Soulquencher
description: Multiple wyvern corpses have finally given this restless Magnamalo soul peace.

name: Schattenstolz+
description: A jet-black, evil blade made during the Magala eclipse. Inflicts deathly banishment.

name: Schattenstolz
description: A jet-black, evil blade made during the Magala eclipse. Inflicts deathly banishment.

name: Verhängnisstolz
description: A wicked, jet-black blade that curses the world. This beacon leads demons into hell's depths.

name: L'Apothéose
description: A blade like a prism that transforms sunlight into a mesmerizing spell.

name: L'Origine
description: A golden great sword with a sparkle so pure, all living creatures are drawn to it.

name: Demon Rod I
description: Wrapped in thunderous Rajang fur, this weapon can easily crush anything it touches.

name: Demon Rod II
description: Wrapped in thunderous Rajang fur, this weapon can easily crush anything it touches.

name: Great Demon Rod
description: An upgraded Demon Rod. Spews thunder that hits hard and shakes the sky.

name: Great Demon Rod+
description: An upgraded Demon Rod. Spews thunder that hits hard and shakes the sky.

name: Great Demon Hot Rod
description: The Demon Rod's ultimate form. Thunder turns to furious roars that reach to infinity.

name: Demonlord Goldrod
description: A golden mass of Rajang menace. One swing summons thunder- clouds that bring ruin to the area.

name: Azure Elder Great Sword I
description: A deep blue great sword with an edge that cuts as swiftly as the wind before a storm.

name: Azure Elder Great Sword II
description: A deep blue great sword with an edge that cuts as swiftly as the wind before a storm.

name: Abyssal Galeblade
description: A powerful wind blade that evokes Ibushi's roar. Could frighten a hundred dragons.

name: Skysplit Hurricane
description: This blade weaves the wind into a squall; its power defies the laws of nature.

name: Thunderbolt Great Sword I
description: As violent as a chaotic thunder storm, holding this great sword is like wielding lightning itself.

name: Abyssal Storm Cleaver
description: A great sword obtained by besting the calamity and Thunder Serpent Narwa.

name: Skysplit Thunderstorm
description: This blade averts disaster and ruin with power that defies the laws of nature.

name: Icesteel Edge I
description: A steel great sword made from ancient Kushala Daora materials. Sharp and frozen.

name: Daora's Decimator
description: This Icesteel Edge upgrade chills prey right down to their very core.

name: Daora's Decimator+
description: This Icesteel Edge upgrade chills prey right down to their very core.

name: Teostra Blade I
description: Crimson blade that holds the power of Teostra. An elegant way to scorch the earth.

name: Daora's Tughril Beg
description: A sword wreathed in frosty breath. One touch turns all living flesh to ice.

name: King Teostra Blade
description: One swing of this upgraded Teostra Blade makes the world a sweltering inferno.

name: King Teostra Blade+
description: One swing of this upgraded Teostra Blade makes the world a sweltering inferno.

name: Grand Shamshir I
description: An eerie Chameleos blade used for hunting. It leaves a deadly miasma in its wake.

name: Teostra del Sol
description: One blow from this blade of ultimate Teostra power and heaven and earth are ablaze.

name: Foreboding Shamshir
description: A Grand Shamshir's upgraded form, and the last thing prey sees past a toxic mist.

name: Foreboding Shamshir+
description: A Grand Shamshir's upgraded form, and the last thing prey sees past a toxic mist.

name: Redwing Claymore I
description: The wing of a Crimson Glow Valstrax made into a sword. Leaves scorch marks on foes.

name: Dreaded Shamshir
description: In the smoky miasma wake of this maledict blade, only deathly silence survives.

name: Reddnaught Claymore
description: Made from a radiant monster wing, this sword shimmers with a dragon's spirit.

name: Crimson Vastwing
description: Made from a radiant monster wing, this sword shimmers with a dragon's spirit.

name: Abyssal Eruption
description: Fourteen terrors from the black abyss. The first was a great rising column of fire.

name: Wyvern's Perch I
description: A wooden sword covered in sharp, toxic mushrooms. Can take the weight of a wyvern.

name: Wyvern's Perch II
description: A wooden sword covered in sharp, toxic mushrooms. Can take the weight of a wyvern.

name: Roguish Deathcap
description: An upgraded Wyvern's Perch. Its deadly poison works on wyverns of all sizes.

name: Roguish Deathcap+
description: An upgraded Wyvern's Perch. Its deadly poison works on wyverns of all sizes.

name: Sleepy Shellblade I
description: A beautiful gift from the sea, this sword sends foes into a bottomless slumber.

name: Lordly Deathcap
description: An ultimate form of Wyvern's Perch so toxic, it will even deliver an elder dragon.

name: Sleepy Shellblade II
description: A beautiful gift from the sea, this sword sends foes into a bottomless slumber.

name: Soporific Shellblade
description: The sleep-inducing effects of this great sword envelop foes like the ocean's waves.

name: Soporific Shellblade+
description: The sleep-inducing effects of this great sword envelop foes like the ocean's waves.

name: Dreamdiver
description: Watch the great shell and fall into unfathomable sleep to slip away with the waves.

name: Frozen Speartuna I
description: A frozen Speartuna wielded as a great sword. Proof of the owner's angling mastery.

name: Frozen Speartuna II
description: A frozen Speartuna wielded as a great sword. Proof of the owner's angling mastery.

name: Freezer Speartuna
description: The Frozen Speartuna's upgraded form. No longer just any old Speartuna.

name: Freezer Speartuna+
description: The Frozen Speartuna's upgraded form. No longer just any old Speartuna.

name: Xiphias Gladius
description: I sought greater heights. My name is Xiphias Gladius. I shall attain absolute zero.

name: Ninja Parasol I
description: An umbrella-sword combo. It can't fend off the rain and monsters at the same time...

name: Ninja Parasol II
description: An umbrella-sword combo. It can't fend off the rain and monsters at the same time...

name: Dragonslayer Parasol
description: Even a heavy shower of dragon fire is no match for this umbrella-sword combo.

name: Dragondance Parasol
description: An elder dragon to deal with in passing? No fear with this para—sword!

name: Dragondance Parasol+
description: An elder dragon to deal with in passing? No fear with this para—sword!

name: Cat's Soul I
description: A sword with a face. Said to house the soul of a Felyne who defended its master.

name: Cat's Soul II
description: A sword with a face. Said to house the soul of a Felyne who defended its master.

name: Cat's Curse
description: An upgrade of the Cat's Soul. Said to be cursed by a Felvine-less Felyne.

name: Cat's King
description: The final form of the Cat's Soul. Said to be cursed by a Felvine-less Felyne.

name: Cat's Curse+
description: An upgrade of the Cat's Soul. Said to be cursed by a Felvine-less Felyne.

name: Royal Order's Great Sword
description: A great sword used by knights of the Order. Only the aspirational may wield it.

name: Royal Order's Great Sword+
description: A great sword used by knights of the Order. Only the aspirational may wield it.

name: Antique Machina GS
description: Great sword of emerald and gold furnished with a mechanism utilizing afflicted energy.

name: Rampage Cleaver II
description: A singular great sword said to mold itself to the desires of its wielder.

name: Rampage Cleaver I
description: A singular great sword said to mold itself to the desires of its wielder.

name: Rampage Cleaver IV
description: A singular great sword said to mold itself to the desires of its wielder.

name: Rampage Cleaver V
description: A singular great sword said to mold itself to the desires of its wielder.

name: Rampage Cleaver S
description: A great warrior does not fear change. This is the sword for such a warrior.

name: Rampage Cleaver III
description: A singular great sword said to mold itself to the desires of its wielder.
